subject: Football
College Athletics
Domestic Violence
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Corwin Brown, a former defensive coordinator at Notre Dame under Charlie Weis, was taken from his home in Granger, Ind., on Friday night with a self-inflicted gunshot wound after a nearly seven-hour standoff, the police said.
snippet: Corwin Brown, a former defensive coordinator at Notre Dame under Charlie Weis, was taken from his home in Granger, Ind., on Friday night with a self-inflicted gunshot wound after a nearly seven-hour standoff, the police said.
